
{{alias}}( dtype )
    Returns a list of array data types to which a provided array data type can
    be safely cast.

    If provided an unrecognized array data type, the function returns `null`.

    Parameters
    ----------
    dtype: string
        Array data type.

    Returns
    -------
    out: Array<string>|null
        List of array data types to which a provided array data type can be
        safely cast.

    Examples
    --------
    > var out = {{alias}}( 'float32' )
    <Array>

    See Also
    --------
